results.title: The Ties that bind
results.creator_credit: Milad Bardan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: It took seven years after the death of his mother and a political assassination in his birth country of Lebanon before Milad really got to know his father. This is a tribute to that man.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Milad Bardan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Waiting to laugh
results.creator_credit: Hamid Naemi, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Now settled in Australia, Afghani born Hamid reflects on the difficult and lonely times he and his sister experienced when they moved to Iran after their mother’s unexpected disappearance and their father’s death one year later.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Hamid Naemi, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: A Different type of game
results.creator_credit: Stephen Hodges, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: The games men play - how cricket and the Aussie male ethos played a major part in Stephen’s adolescent years and on into his adult life. He learnt to play the game and the game never dies.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Stephen Hodges, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: My life to study
results.creator_credit: Fei Hu Song, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Fei Hu Song and his family came from China to Australia, they all took English language courses. This began for Hu Song a lifetime of study and of making Australia his home.

results.title: Straford video memories
results.creator_credit: John Straford, Frank Straford and Inala Video
results.brief_description:
Video memories of the Victorian west coast and bushfires in the north-east produced by the Straford family.
“Gone to blazes” contains footage broadcast by national and commercial TV channels during the course of the devastating bushfires that ravaged the Victorian north-east early in 2003.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Straford, Frank Straford and Inala Video
results.description:

results.title: Land rights views: Number 8, July 1997 (A)
results.creator_credit: Northern Land Council Media Unit and Northern Land Council
results.brief_description: A yearly magazine program dealing with issues associated with the Northern Land Council. This edition includes reports on the Jawoyn ‘Five Year Plan’, the Crocker Island seas native title claim, the Wik decision, a social impact study in the Kakadu region, the fight to save Railway Dam in Darwin and the ‘Black economy’ in the Top End. Music from various Aboriginal acts is also featured.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Northern Land Council Media Unit and Northern Land Council
results.description: A yearly magazine program dealing with issues associated with the Northern Land Council. This edition includes reports on the Jawoyn ‘Five Year Plan’, the Crocker Island seas native title claim, the Wik decision, a social impact study in the Kakadu region, the fight to save Railway Dam in Darwin and the ‘Black economy’ in the Top End. Music from various Aboriginal acts is also featured.
